short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pikachu Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Pikachu background. Custom Pikachu wallpaper background theme for Pokemon fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Pikachu wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Randomize or favorite Pikachu backgrounds via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize the Google search bar.
4. Quickly access your emails and social media accounts.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Write down tasks with the New Note feature.
7. Easily access your most visited websites.
8. Quickly reach your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for fast access.
10. Access Google apps with a single click.
11. Explore more themes quickly.
12. Share easily to social media.
13. Download wallpapers with one click.
14. Quickly access to play games.
15. Enable fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in the Pikachu new tab.
